channel.title: Is it recommended to use VirtualMachineManager in full-screen with Whonix for KVM?
channel.description: Hi there and thanks for the great work! As the title mentions, is it recommended to use VirtualMachineManager in full-screen with Whonix for KVM?

item.title: Is it recommended to use VirtualMachineManager in full-screen with Whonix for KVM?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Recommended.

Related. Currently lacks KVM specifics.

item.title: Is it recommended to use VirtualMachineManager in full-screen with Whonix for KVM?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
For usability yes.

The VMM gui is a separate component from virsh/libvirt which can be used from the commandline too if you prefer.

Read full topic
